price: Kuri uwo munsi ikirere kizasatagurika. Isezerano rye (Allah) rizasohora nta gushidikanya.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
